CONFLICT_NOTIFICATION.description:
**PLACEHOLDER_TEAM1** vs **PLACEHOLDER_TEAM2**

Your teams have no overlapping availability in their registered time windows.

**Options:**
1Ô∏è‚É£ Select a suggested time slot below that works for both teams
2Ô∏è‚É£ All players must confirm the selected time
3Ô∏è‚É£ Decline to withdraw your team from the tournament

‚è∞ **Deadline:** 48 hours
If no agreement is reached, both teams will be excluded.
